csci331.team.red.shared

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • csci331.team.red.shared.Level

  • public class Level
extends java.lang.Object
    Java implementation of a game level.
    Contains several static methods which return hardcoded instances of Level
    FIXME: Stub This really should be an enum...

    ojourmel
